Name: Travel Mug Little Miss Giggles
Description: Little Miss Giggles is an adorable girl with red pigtails who can't stop giggling. So if you have your own chirpy Little Miss Giggles in your life, delight them with this Travel Mug.Designed in England and made from durable plastic, the Little Miss Giggles Travel Mug features a handy screw-top lid, so your giggling companion can sip her coffee while she's on the go. Description: Our ceramic coffee mugs are a great way to express yourself. They are dishwasher and microwave safe and come supplied in a presentation box making them a perfect gift idea.

Name: Espresso Set | Animals | Folklore
Description: A collection inspired by night and day!This new Metalware collection is inspired by an enchanted woodland by night and day. Featuring a complete range in midnight blue hues and contrasting white, some with our favourite woodland creatures such as owls, foxes, bears and birds, this set is graphiclly simplistic in design with contrasting navy and white designs featuring a pattern like little rain drops |white snow on a white or navy base with contrasting trim. A bright red heart feature in place of one of the rain/snow drops and completes the design beautifully! The plates feature a strolling bear in intricate folklore patterns.This set is ideal for coffee lovers to use in the home, camping, festivals or picnics in the park. Supplied in a lovely gift box, this would also make a perfect present! This range is also available in other designs such as a coffee pot, mugs, sugar| storage bowl and the cutest milk jug. See Separate listings for these.Made from:Metaled metalHand wash only, not suitable for microwave use150 ml capacity eachCan be heated up to 270В°C
